select * from manage_punch where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and date_format(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') = date_format(now(), '%Y-%m-%d')
and (punch_type = 0 or punch_type = 2)
and (punch_type = 1 or punch_type = 3)
order by create_time desc limit 1

SELECT DISTINCT su.user_id, su.chinese_name as userName, m1.create_time as upTime, m1.punch_type as upType, m1.position as upPosition, m2.create_time as downTime, m2.punch_type as downType, m2.position as downPosition from sys_user su left join manage_punch m1 on m1.user_id = su.user_id and (m1.punch_type = 0 or m1.punch_type = 2) left join manage_punch m2 on m1.user_id = m2.user_id and (m1.punch_type = 0 or m1.punch_type = 2) and (m2.punch_type = 1 or m2.punch_type = 3) and DATE_FORMAT(m1.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(m2.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d')
(su.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT} or su.super_id in (select user_id from sys_user where super_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}))
and DATE_FORMAT(m1.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') = #{date,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and (m1.punch_type = 0 or m1.punch_type = 2)
